name: Frantic Pharmacy (Beta)
description:
Collect prescriptions and deliver pills to patients in need in this quirky pharmacy simulation game! (Controls detailed below.)

Frantic Pharmacy is currently under development.
Please play in Fullscreen Mode.
Please play with sound on as this is an important part of the game's feel.
Please fill out the Beta Feedback Form when you are done playing.

If running the game on low-end hardware such as basic laptops/Chromebooks then sometimes you will not be able to interact with the patients for some strange reason. If you refresh the page and reload the game a couple of times, this seems to fix the issue, although sometimes the patients animations will not play fully leaving them in a position where you cannot interact with them. The game is not originally designed for web browser, but this provides a more accessible platform for feedback.

Controls

WASD / Arrows - Move
Left Shift - Dash
Space / Left Mouse Click - Interact

Game concept, design and development by Rhydian Carter.

Produced for Leeds Beckett University as part of BSc (Hons) Games Design, Level 6, "Production Project" Module.
